items.content_html: Dear was right. What I was missing was personal space. VR gives me that personal space. The flat screen experience, something simple, is all I needed.

items.content_html: I always wanted to be an expert and know everything. What I need to focus on is making my life and others easier. Know my focus and trust others.

items.content_html:
Soft Boiled Eggs

Ingredients

  • eggs
  • salt
  • water

tools

  • pot
  • stove
  • bowl

Steps

  1. Put water in pot
  2. Add salt to pot
  3. Put stove on high and heat water to a boil
  4. add eggs and boil for 8 minutes
  5. Remove eggs from pot and place in bowl with cold water
  6. once eggs cool down, enjoy!
items.content_text:
# Soft Boiled Eggs

____
## Ingredients
* eggs
* salt
* water

## tools
* pot
* stove
* bowl 

## Steps
1. Put water in pot
2. Add salt to pot
3. Put stove on high and heat water to a boil
4. add eggs and boil for 8 minutes
5. Remove eggs from pot and place in bowl with cold water
6. once eggs cool down, enjoy!
